items.summary: Update admin authorization so that competition-creation/admin access is granted to either (a) users whose stored email is allowlisted, including "midhun.speedcuber@gmail.com" and "thiirdparty.mcubes@gmail.com", OR (b) users whose stored mcubes user ID is exactly "MCUBES-0".

Update the frontend admin gating messaging to reflect that there can be multiple allowlisted administrators (not just a single admin), and ensure the AdminGuard continues to block access to the admin competition creation page when the backend reports the caller is not an admin.
